runInModes.name: DefaultMode
runInModes.value: User or System Context—Depends on How Flow is Launched
runInModes.helpMessage: flow will run without system mode

runInModes.name: SystemModeWithSharing
runInModes.value: System Context with Sharing—Enforces Record-Level Access
runInModes.helpMessage: flow will run with system mode with sharing

runInModes.name: SystemModeWithoutSharing
runInModes.value: System Context Without Sharing—Access All Data
runInModes.helpMessage: flow will run with system mode without sharing
